text: Ceroplesis capensis is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Carl Linnaeus in 1764. It is known from South Africa."Ceroplesis capensis". BioLib. Retrieved 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Ceroplesis Category:Beetles described in 1764 Category:Taxa named by Carl Linnaeus
title: Ceroplesis capensis
